query.stmt: select bta.apply_id,bta.account,bta.name,spd.name dept_name,spd.parent_id parent_id, decode(bti.trade_status,0,'未入会',1,'已入会',2,'已退会',3,'欠费被退会') trade_status, to_char(apply_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') apply_time,bta.card_no,bta.tele_phone,bta.email,bta.reason from bi_trade_apply bta left join sys_p_department spd on bta.dept_id=spd.id left join bi_trade_info bti on bta.account=bti.account where bta.apply_type=[type] and bta.apply_status=[status] <#if user_dept_id??> and bta.dept_id in (with tmp as( select a.*, level leaf from SYS_P_DEPARTMENT a START with a.id=[user_dept_id] connect by prior a.parent_id = a.id ) select TMP.id from tmp where leaf = 2 or leaf = 3 or leaf = 1) </#if>
